Spain: Battle of Las Babias: Córdoba attacked and routed an Asturian force near Astorga, Spain.
Ireland: First Viking raids on Iona, Rathlin Island, and Inishmurray.
Germany: Charlemagne established the Marca Hispanica between the Pyrenees and the Ebro.
France: The Spanish March was created by Charlemagne as a buffer zone between the Frankish kingdom and Al-Andalus.
